methods.name: checkItem
desc: sets the state of the item to be checked or unchecked.

methods.name: endExecute
desc: ends the execution of the PopupMenu.

methods.name: execute
desc: executes the popup menu and returns the selected item or 0, if cancelled.

methods.name: getAcceleratorKeyEvent
desc: retrieves the KeyEvent for the menu item.
The KeyEvent is only used as a container to transport the shortcut information, so that in this case com.sun.star.lang.EventObject.Source is NULL.

methods.name: getItemImage
desc: retrieves the image for the menu item.

methods.name: insertSeparator
desc: inserts a separator at the specified position.

methods.name: isInExecute
desc: queries if the PopupMenu is being.
Returns TRUE only if the PopupMenu is being executed as a result of invoking XPopupMenu.execute(); that is, for a PopupMenu activated by a MenuBar item, this methods returns FALSE.

methods.name: isItemChecked
desc: returns whether the item is checked or unchecked.

methods.name: setAcceleratorKeyEvent
desc: sets the KeyEvent for the menu item.

The KeyEvent is only used as a container to transport the shortcut information, this methods only draws the text corresponding to this keyboard shortcut. The client code is responsible for listening to keyboard events (typically done via XUserInputInterception), and dispatch the respective command.

methods.name: setItemImage
desc: sets the image for the menu item.
